benchmark_details.name: OntoRock
benchmark_details.overview: OntoRock is a benchmark created for evaluating the robustness of Named Entity Recognition (NER) models using natural adversarial examples generated from the OntoNotes dataset.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To audit the robustness of named entity recognition (NER) models through adversarial examples.

data.source: Combination of the OntoNotes dataset and adversarial examples generated using the RockNER method.
data.annotation: Utilizes existing annotated data from OntoNotes for NER tasks.

methods: Evaluation of NER models using adversarial examples generated via RockNER.
Comparison of model performance on original vs. OntoRock dataset.
methodology.calculation: F1 score is calculated based on matches between predicted and true entities.
methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better robustness against adversarial attacks.
methodology.baseline_results: RoBERTa-CRF F1 score drops from 92.4% on OntoNotes to 58.5% on OntoRock.
methodology.validation: Evaluation based on performance metrics on both original and adversarial datasets.
